quote: You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work.
description: Focus on your duties without attachment to outcomes.
example: Study hard not just to top the exam, but to gain knowledge.

quote: Change is the law of the universe.
description: Nothing is permanent—good or bad.
example: Tough times are temporary, like the passing seasons.

quote: A person can rise through the efforts of his own mind.
description: Self-effort and discipline shape your destiny.
example: Even if born in poverty, hard work and focus can lead to success.

quote: There is neither this world, nor the world beyond, nor happiness for the one who doubts.
description: Doubt weakens action and faith. Be confident in your path.
example: If you constantly doubt your ability to learn, you’ll stop trying.

quote: Man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he is.
description: Your thoughts and beliefs shape your reality.
example: If you believe you’re capable, your actions will reflect it.
